message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $1200000, but I understand its true worth to you might be even higher. My proposal is to offer it to you at a price that reflects its value and benefits to you, which is $1150000. This price ensures that both parties benefit, with you receiving a product that exceeds your expectations and me securing a fair return for my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice.
